summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 FORD FUSION. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER FAILED TO PROVIDE THE PART FROM THE SUPPLIER WITHIN A REASONABLE TIMEFRAME REGARDING NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V384000 (AIR BAGS). THE DEALER (SUPERIOR FORD, 4303 LA-19, ZACHARY, LA 70791, (225) 654-2611) STATED THAT THE PART WAS NOT AVAILABLE. THE CONTACT WAS INFORMED THAT THE DEALER WOULD FOLLOW-UP WITH A CALL ONCE THE PART BECAME AVAILABLE, BUT THE CONTACT HAD NOT RECEIVED A CALL FOR MONTHS. THE CONTACT WAS PLACED ON A WAITING LIST FOR THE VEHICLE TO BE REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
